name: Sacrament
description: This is a game with features that are more girl-appealing. Gameplay is like an fascinating novel, in which your choices will influence all, including all different endings.
minimum_requirements: OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP Processor: 1.2 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card Storage: 400 MB available space
